content: tanuknits- overnight oats vest yarn- 1 strand each lopi lettlopi + cumulus fyberspates gauge- 18st=4 in back 1 co 52 st purl first and then stockinette for 20 cm 2 following increases 8 times rs- k1 m1r k till last st m1l k1 2 st increased ws-purl across total piece now measures 26cm 3 increase the following 2 times rs- *k1 m1r k1 m1r k til last 2 st m1l k1 m1l k1 4 st increase ws- purl across 4 stockinette for 34 row more or until preferred length 5 switch to 4mm needles and knit 1x1 rib for 14 row cast off in tubular bind off left shoulder and yoke 1 on 5mm needles rs facing pick up 18 st from the neck moving outwards to the shoulder edge 2 knit in stockinette for 9cm 3 from the next rs row onwards perform the following increase 8 times rs k1 m1l knit till end increase 1 st ws- purl all st rs- knit all st ws- purl all 4 knit stockinette until piece measures 20cm from picked up st if not already there 5 now shape the armhole as before perform the following increases 8 times rs- knit till last st m1r k1 1 st increased ws-purl across then increase the following 2 times rs- *k til last 2 st m1r k1 m1r k1 2 st increase ws- purl across 6 stockinette for 34 row more or until preferred length 7 switch to 4mm needles and knit 1x1 rib for 14 row cast off in tubular bind off tightly right shoulder and yoke 1 on 5 mm needles rs facing pick up 18 st from the shoulder edge moving inwards 2 knit in stockinette for 9cm 3 from the next rs row onwards perform the following increase 8 times rs knit till last st left on left-side needle m1r k1 increase 1 st ws- purl all st rs- knit all st ws- purl all 4 knit stockinette until piece measures 20cm from picked up st if not already there 5 now shape the armhole as before perform the following increases 8 times rs- k1 m1l k till last st 1 st increased ws-purl across then increase the following 2 times rs- *k1 m1l k1 m1l k til last 2 st 2 st increase ws- purl across 6 stockinette st for 34 row or same as back 7 switch to 4mm needles and knit 1x1 rib for 14 row cast off in tubular bind off tightly finishing touches 1 seam the sides of the two yokes to the back using an invisible seam 2 use 4mm round needles to pick up 100 st along the right arm hole and knit in 1x1 rib for 5 rounds bind off using italian bind off 3 repeat for the left arm hole 4 pick up all st starting from the bottom of the right yoke moving up to the neck and going all the way around to the bottom of the left yoke
